name: Terror Of The Vampire
description:
In the Vague 1800s, in Vague Eastern Europe, a vampire menace grips the countryside: the menace of superstition and the belief that vampires exist.

Join Dr. Ego Goodmind, BHD as he does research for his newest psychology book, The Empirical Vampirical.

But is he in over his incredibly big head this time?

A SFW gothic-horror-comedy from the creators of  Cheetahs Are Meant To Be Fastfeaturing

  • Authentic 8-bit graphics by the amazing Khatoblepas
  • Writing and design from EHCB, Khatoblepas and Samael
  • MIDi music from jamespaddockmusic.com
  • Jokes!
  • Feelings!
